snippet: A package of measures includes eliminating the expectation that certain students take jobs during the school year, guaranteeing paid internships and providing career counseling.
abstract: University of Chicago is unveiling package of measures to make applying faster, simpler and cheaper, and to make studying there more affordable.
lead_paragraph: A package of measures includes eliminating the expectation that certain students take jobs during the school year, guaranteeing paid internships and providing career counseling.

headline.main: University of Chicago Acts to Improve Access for Lower-Income Students
headline.print_headline: University of Chicago Acts to Improve Access for Lower-Income Students
